title: Fluorine-free “solvent-in-salt” sodium battery electrolytes: solvation structure and dynamics
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00002A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yanqi Xu, Andrei Filippov, Sourav Bhowmick, Patrik Johansson, Faiz Ullah Shah
Most “solvent-in-salt” (SIS) electrolytes are based on heavily fluorinated anions. Here we create fluorine-free SIS electrolytes with many promising basic characteristics for future sodium battery application.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
